text: 12.25: Mt 9.4 naŋga, Jo 2.25 naŋga, Sk 2.23Hara Jisas nurɨŋandɨ indarɨmit hambu ŋgami. Harɨm nurɨŋ nɨmavami, Pɨrɨvɨsa mɨnzayɨndu ŋɨnɨŋ sɨhɨrata arɨkinzapa kɨta kurɨhata, krunavundi kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ ñambatɨhu. Pɨhu aru muyɨ hati vaha mana tavɨ mɨnzayɨndu ŋɨnɨŋ tamarahata arɨkinzapa kɨta kurɨhata, krunavundi kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ tɨkatɨka mandɨhu.
